Responsive Form

In this project we created an HTML form which has four input field types: text, email, url, and password, along with a submit button. As the width of the screen changes, the layout of the form also changes.

Zebra Table

For this project we created a webpage which has a responsive HTML table. The table should fill 80% of the width of the screen but have a maximum width of 1500px and a minimum width of 600px.
